metadata.title: CVE-2017-6514 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: WordPress 4.7.2 mishandles listings of post authors, which allows remoteattackers to obtain sensitive information (Path Disclosure) via a/wp-json/oembed/1.0/embed?url= request, related to the "author_name":"substring.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
